header.abstract: The Latino Student Union (University of Kentucky) records (dated 2015, 2018-2019; .18 cubic feet, 1 slim box; 4 online resources, 2 websites and 2 social media platforms) comprises University of Kentucky Latino Student Union (LSU) records for spring 2019, including event and recruitment flyers, the LSU end-of-semester review written by President Daniela Gamez Salgado, flyers and other event information for other UK Latino student-serving organizations, and a photograph.

Latino Student Union (University of Kentucky)

descriptive_summary.prefercite: 2019ua043 : [identification of item], Latino Student Union (University of Kentucky) records, 2015, 2018-2019, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The University of Kentucky Latino Student Union was founded in 2014. The mission is to unite and strengthen the Hispanic/Latino community on campus, while fostering a bond between students (Hispanic/Latino, or of cultural interest), faculty, and the community we will one day serve.

Sources: 1. Latino Student Union. https://uky.campuslabs.com/engage/organization/latino-student-union. Accessed 2/27/2023. 2. Latino Student Union, University of Kentucky website. https://uklatinosu.wixsite.com/lsuuky. Accessed 2/27/2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Latino Student Union (University of Kentucky) records (dated 2015, 2018-2019; .18 cubic feet, 1 slim box; 4 online resources, 2 websites and 2 social media platforms) comprises University of Kentucky Latino Student Union (LSU) records for spring 2019, including event and recruitment flyers, the LSU end-of-semester review written by President Daniela Gamez Salgado, flyers and other event information for other UK Latino student-serving organizations, and a photograph. Also includes the organization's two websites, Twitter feed and Instagram account, captured February 27, 2023. These records were harvested through Archive-It and Webrecorder. Grouped under https://archive-it.org/collections/11310?fc=websiteGroup%3ALatino+Student+Union

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the University of Kentucky. The University of Kentucky holds the copyright for materials created in the course of business by University of Kentucky employees. Copyright for all other materials has not been assigned to the University of Kentucky. For information about permission to reproduce or publish, please contact the Special Collections Research Center.
